title: Immunization
author: Harivansh Chopra Follow Professor; Community Medicine
description: IMMUNIZATION DR HARIVANSH CHOPRA DCH.,MD. PROFESSOR COMMUNITY MEDICINE LLRM MEDICAL COLLEGE ,MEERUT DR. HARIVANSH CHOPRA (harichop@gmail.com) 3/19/2019 1 OBJE...
cleaned_text: Immunization is one of the best public health intervention to prevent morbidity as well as mortality. it also help in prevention of malnutrition in young children.still developing countries are trying hard to make it universal. in india lot of changes have taken place in the immunization schedule and number of newer vaccines have been incorporated. still the awareness as well as acceptability is not universal . this presentation is very basic and will help students as well as teachers. we all have to join hands to make it universal
